name: Vessel
description:
This is a unique one piece design with a beautiful surface pattern which pays homage to the extraordinary glass ceiling of the British Museum. Vessel is made from a single sheet of acrylic which is cut, patterned and finally bent to create the raised surface which floats over the three feet.

A high quality yet minimalist design piece from as little intervention or as few process as possible. The shape is fluid and organic yet the surface pattern is geometric and precise. Serves as a simple yet elegant centrepiece, which can be used indoors and outdoors when entertaining and is easy to clean.

Dimensions: Height: H 80 mm, Length 380 mm, Width 380 mm

Material: Acrylic

Delivery: 2 weeks from stock

Free shipping in the UK

name: Stellar Astro 350 (White)
description: As seen in Elle Decoration magazine (June '08, October '08) Comes flat pack for easy assembly. Works with UK B22 and EUROPEAN E14, E27 and US E26 pendant fittings. Maximum 15W bulb required. Best used with compact fluorescent lamps for maximum effect. PP components and packaging can be recycled. Designed and made in the UK. Dimensions: Sphere ; H 350 mm, Dia 350 mm Materials: Polypropylene Delivery: 2 weeks from stock Free shipping in the UK

name: Stellar Cosmos Pendant shade (White)
description: Selected for HEALS DISCOVERS 2007, this is a stunning contemporary lighting range fit for any space. Available in pendant, table top and floor standing versions, this is a statement piece by day and night. Comes flat pack for easy assembly. Works with UK B22 and EUROPEAN E14, E27 and US E26 pendant fittings. Maximum 60W bulb required. Best used with compact fluorescent lamps for maximum effect. PP components and packaging can be recycled. Designed and made in the UK. Dimensions: Height: H 325 mm, Dia 375 mm Materials: Polypropylene Delivery: 2 weeks from stock Free shipping in the UK

name: Stellar Cosmos Table Lamp (White)
description:
Originally for HEALS DISCOVERS, this is a stunning contemporary lighting range fit for any space. Available also in pendant and floor standing versions, this is a statement piece by day and night.

The Stellar Lights range is inspired by the natural ways in which tessellations work, how they've been an everyday part of daily life and yet how we don't notice them. Tessellations are seen throughout art history, from ancient architecture to modern art.

We love how they can be used to create a tactile 3d pattern, making them the focal detail of any product/surface. Also how simple forms can become complex, arresting patterns. 

Comes flat pack for easy assembly.
Works with E27 fittings.

Maximum 100W ES bulb required.
Best used with compact fluorescent lamps for maximum effect.

PP components and packaging can be recycled.
Designed and made in the UK.

Dimensions: H 860mm Dia 375mm (lamp base 560mm high by 120mm diameter) 

Materials: Polypropylene

Delivery: 2 weeks from stock

Free shipping in the UK

name: Conchiglia Pendant shade (Birch)
description: A simple and striking pendant shade that makes an impression every time. The shell-like form is achieved by rolling and interlocking the shade. Maximum bulb wattage is 60W though we recommend energy saving bulbs as they are less hot. Comes flat-packed with easy to follow instructions for immediate use with existing pendant fitting. Dimensions: H 29 x W 50 x D 15 cm Colour: Natural Materials: Finnish Birch Ply Delivery: 2 weeks from stock Free shipping in the UK

description: A simple and striking pendant shade that demands attention in any interior setting. This clever form is achieved by rolling and slotting the shade onto the lighting cable. Maximum bulb wattage is 60W though we recommend energy saving bulbs as they are less hot. Comes flat-packed with easy to follow instructions for immediate use with existing pendant fitting.
